content: "Paint a photorealistic portrait of a young man standing in a magical forest, dressed as a wizard. The man should be depicted with a confident, powerful expression on his face, with a staff in one hand and a spell book in the other. In the background, a variety of enchanted trees and other magical elements should be visible, with a shimmering, glowing aura surrounding the man. Use advanced techniques such as lighting and shading to create a highly realistic image."
